Uses of Package
net.jodah.failsafe

  • Packages that use net.jodah.failsafe 
    Package Description
    net.jodah.failsafe
    Core Failsafe APIs for performing failsafe executions.
    net.jodah.failsafe.event
    Event listener types.
    net.jodah.failsafe.function
    Functional interface types.
  • Classes in net.jodah.failsafe used by net.jodah.failsafe 
    Class and Description
    AsyncFailsafe
    Performs asynchronous executions according to a RetryPolicy and CircuitBreaker.
    AsyncListenerConfig
    Failsafe execution event listeners that are called asynchronously on the Scheduler or ScheduledExecutorService associated with the Failsafe call.
    CircuitBreaker
    A circuit breaker that temporarily halts execution when configurable thresholds are exceeded.
    CircuitBreaker.State
    The state of the circuit.
    ExecutionContext
    Contextual execution information.
    FailsafeFuture
    The future result of an asynchronous Failsafe execution.
    ListenerConfig
    Listener configuration.
    Listeners
    Failsafe execution event listeners.
    RetryPolicy
    A policy that defines when retries should be performed.
    SyncFailsafe
    Performs synchronous executions according to a RetryPolicy and CircuitBreaker.
  • Classes in net.jodah.failsafe used by net.jodah.failsafe.event 
    Class and Description
    ExecutionContext
    Contextual execution information.
  • Classes in net.jodah.failsafe used by net.jodah.failsafe.function 
    Class and Description
    AsyncExecution
    Tracks asynchronous executions and allows retries to be scheduled according to a RetryPolicy.
    ExecutionContext
    Contextual execution information.
